Module com.javafx.brick_javafx
Package BrickDestroy.Models

Class Brick

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Models.Brick
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrick, ClayBrick, MetalBrick, SteelBrick
public abstract class Brick extends Object
An abstract model class that contains the data and behaviour of all bricks in the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Brick

      public Brick(String name, javafx.geometry.Point2D position, javafx.geometry.Dimension2D size, javafx.scene.paint.Color border, javafx.scene.paint.Color inner, int strength)
      A constructor to initialize the brick data.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the brick.
      position - The position of the brick when spawned in game.
      size - The size of brick.
      border - The border color of the brick.
      inner - The inner color of the brick.
      strength - How many times a ball needs to collide with the break in order to break it.

      pos - The position of the brick.
      size - The size of the brick.

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact()
      A method to break the brick when ball has collided to it if the brick is not broken.
      Returns:
      the boolean value that indicates brick broken status.

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact(javafx.geometry.Point2D position, int dir)
      A method to break the brick when ball has collided to it if the brick is not broken.
      Parameters:
      position - the position where the ball is in contact with the brick.
      dir - the direction of the collision impact.
      Returns:
      the boolean value that indicates brick broken status.
